instruction: Describe the aesthetics of a landscape
output: The landscape had an ethereal quality to it, with sunlight filtering through the trees and casting a soothing golden hue on the surroundings. A soft breeze blew, rustling the leaves of the trees and creating a peaceful atmosphere. In the distance, a gentle stream meandered through the land and birds sang in harmony. It was a breathtaking sight and Jane felt as though she could stay there forever to take in the beauty of the great outdoors.
